name: Fancy Garments
desc: Fancy Garments is a full-stack MERN e-commerce platform with secure payments, order tracking, admin dashboard, multi-language support, and an AI-powered chatbot

name: Travel Website
desc: Every Travel is a responsive travel website with destination search, booking, cart checkout, and an admin panel for real-time user management.

name: Online Book Store
desc: This site has been made using PHP with MYSQL (procedure functions)! The layout use Bootstrap to make it more responsive. It's just a simple web.site to buy and sell books.

name: Learning Management System
desc: A Web Based Learning Managenent System. This Project is developed using HTML, CSS, Javascript. this project aims to create a cooperative platform that bridges people together and helps them to learn.

name: AI Safety Incident Dashboard
desc: Build a simple interactive interface to demonstrate core frontend skills—UI, user interaction, state management, and input handling—aligned with HumanChain's AI safety mission.

name: Furniture-Store
desc: Furnish Your Dream Home is an online furniture store with customizable products, a 3D room planner, and a seamless shopping experience.

name: Fitness Management System
desc: Developed a console-based fitness management system in C to manage client records, workout schedules, and membership details.
